result.reason: External tool toolbar buttons lack tooltips showing the command details
result.approach: In AddExternalToolsToToolBar(), set button.ToolTipText to show the tool FileName and Arguments (e.g. 'putty.exe -ssh %host%') so users can see what each toolbar button does on hover

attempts.raw_output:
Now I have a clear picture. The issue requests adding tooltips for external tools on the toolbar. Looking at `ExternalToolsToolStrip.cs:81`, when toolbar buttons are created, no `ToolTipText` is set. The fix is straightforward â€” set `button.ToolTipText` to show useful info like the tool's filename/arguments.
